definition: to conduct oneself/same as 做人
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

Zhou Zuoren (1885-1967), brother of Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅, academic in Japanese and Greek studies, briefly imprisoned after the war as Japanese collaborator, persecuted and died of unknown causes during the Cultural Revolution

sentences.english: But Baldwin admits his officers can't catch everything using scanners.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾溫承認工作人員無法用掃描儀監控所有物品。

sentences.english: All the Arsenal staff and everyone else have helped me.
sentences.chinese: 所有的阿森納工作人員和每一個其他人都在幫助我。

sentences.english: Tokens in cash or kind to staff are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 同敬懷仁院禁止所有工作人員接受任何現金或禮物。

sentences.english: Other workers will engineer a result after months of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 其他工作人員將在進化數月之後監造一個結果。

sentences.english: The officer will confirm that you still meet the requirements for admission to Canada.
sentences.chinese: 工作人員會確證你是否仍然符合移民加拿大的要求。

sentences.english: Supervises and directs Reception and Reservations personnel.
sentences.chinese: 對接待部和預訂部工作人員進行監督和指導。

sentences.english: Any judicial officer who abuses his power and commits the crime mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be given a heavier punishment.
sentences.chinese: 司法工作人員濫用職權，犯前款罪的，從重處罰。

sentences.english: The staff wanted him to live and prayed with him everyday.
sentences.chinese: 工作人員鼓勵他活下去，並每天與他一道做祈禱。

sentences.english: The crime of bending the law for self-seeding is the judicial staff malfeasance of ceremony punishment…
sentences.chinese: 徇私枉法罪是典型的司法工作人員瀆職犯罪。

sentences.english: Departures from seasonal jobs, such as Census taker, are not counted.
sentences.chinese: 季節性工作人員的離職，如普查人員，沒有加入統計。

sentences.english: Thanks again and could you please say thank you to all your workman for me too.
sentences.chinese: 再次感謝並且希望你代我對所有的工作人員說聲謝謝。

sentences.english: Can non-national public servants commit the bribery crime?
sentences.chinese: 非國家工作人員可否構成受賄罪共犯？

sentences.english: Extension agent, worker Low-level staff providing assistance and advice to farmers.
sentences.chinese: 人員向農民提供幫助和諮詢的下層工作人員。

sentences.english: A worker is screened for radiation before entering the emergency operation center at the nuclear plant.
sentences.chinese: 進入應急指揮中心前，工作人員接受核輻射檢查。

sentences.english: Airline personnel collect the spare coins and paper currency from passengers.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司工作人員從乘客那裏收集這些硬幣和紙幣。

sentences.english: What do we call them? They are at the dinning -hall, the hotel and the restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 在餐廳，旅館和飯店都有的工作人員是什麼？

definition: to conduct oneself/to behave with integrity
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
equally true for (all the rest)/the same thing applies (for everyone)
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
The School Sayings of Confucius (abbr. for 孔子家語|孔子家语[Kong3 zi3 Jia1 yu3])
(to play) one's part/one's role/one's duty/(to stay within) one's bounds/dutiful/keeping to one's role
